description:
The Mobile Banking app is a convenient way to access your finances on the go. You can check your accounts, block and reorder payment cards, personalise the overview tab and more.  

What can I do in Nordea's mobile banking app  

- In the Overview tab, you can see all your finances in one place. Add, hide or re-arrange the content on the overview page to personalise your experience.  

- Conveniently transfer money between your accounts or to a friend.  

- Quickly pay your physical invoices by scanning them with your camera.  

- Access your digital wallet - Pay with Apple Pay.  

- Log on securely with BankID, Nordea ID, your biometrics or personal code. The choice is yours.  

Convenient access to your cards  

- If you forget your PIN code for one of your cards, you can view it directly in the app.  

- If you lose one of your cards, you can temporarily or permanently block it. If you permanently block a card, a new card will be sent automatically to your registered address.  

- You can minimize the risk of fraud by limiting which geographical areas your credit card can be used and by restricting usage for online shopping.  

 Savings and investments: 

- You can now get an overview of your savings and investments inside the app. In addition, you can buy stocks and funds, create saving plans and see how your investments are developing.   

Mortgage 

- You can see your many mortgage details and can increase monthly deductions and apply for exemption from repayment. Convenient mortage handling.       


A deeper insight into your finances  

- In the Insights tab, you can see your income and expenditure at a glance. Gain deeper insights by viewing where and how you spend your income with the app's categorisation feature.  

- You can add other banks to the app so you can have all your finances in one place.  

We are here for you.  

At Nordea, we put our customer's needs first. Contact us directly through the app, either through our online chat, phone, or book an online meeting with an advisor.  
  
The mobile banking app is designed with you in mind.  

We continuously update the app based on your feedback, to ensure you have the best experience possible. Leave us a review or send feedback directly through the app. We would love to hear your thoughts.
releaseNotes:
We have a new update ready for you. 

- Search functionality for credit card transactions.
- Navigate to your most used features with the new Quick actions in the Overview tab.
          •Personalize your view
          •Change the order of the different shortcuts
- New chart component in Insight tab's Expenses view. Compare selected period's total expenses. 
- Edit the Insurance widget
- Better results when searching in Help tab.

We hope you like the new and improved updates!  
      
Nordea Mobile Team
